title: Primož Roglič’s Tour de France Hopes Hit Hard by Vlasov’s Exit: ‘It’s a Big Loss’
content:
Podium favorite Roglič will face the decisive second half of the Tour de France without key mountain helper Aleksandr Vlasov: 'We will miss him.'

Read the full article at Primož Roglič’s Tour de France Hopes Hit Hard by Vlasov’s Exit: ‘It’s a Big Loss’ on Velo.
